attributes.action: Do something about every 3rd car that releases toxic black fumes in London
attributes.additional_details: Why is that you "care" so much about environment and euro 6 emissions, "low emission"(I know why, so people spend money on new cars... But that doesn't solve issue) but nothing is done about even euro 6 cars that release toxic black/blue fumes. I can bet £500 that if I go for a 5 minute drive in London streets I will find at least 5 cars that release black or blue smoke... That's how bad it is in London and NO One does anything about this?
attributes.background: Stop and give fines of up to £1000 to such cars that not only pollute this city but also make your life and many others shorter... (Releasing huge amount of black/blue smoke from the exhaust)

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to the reduction of air pollution in London are a matter for the Mayor of London and the London Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition to the London Assembly, asking them to take this action, if that is something you'd like to see happen. You can find out how to do this here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
